song_name: For Those About to Rock (We Salute You)
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, For Those About to Rock (We Salute You) is significantly more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
